text: "Deeper Underground" is a 1998 song by English funk band Jamiroquai and is taken from the 1998 movie Godzilla soundtrack and was included as the leading single from their fourth studio album Synkronized. It went to number 1 in Scotland and the United Kingdom, number 2 in Iceland, number 7 in Italy, number 8 in Finland, number 9 in Ireland and Switzerland, number 10 in Spain and number 33 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== UK CD1 # "Deeper Underground" (radio edit) – 3:33 # "Deeper Underground" (The Metro Mix) – 6:59 # "Deeper Underground" (instrumental) – 4:44 UK CD2 # "Deeper Underground" – 4:44 # "Deeper Underground" (The Ummah Mix) – 5:01 # "Deeper Underground" (S-Man Meets Da Northface Killa Dub) – 9:02 UK cassette single and European CD single # "Deeper Underground" (radio edit) – 3:33 # "Deeper Underground" (The Metro Mix) – 6:59 Australian and Japanese CD single # "Deeper Underground" (radio edit) # "Deeper Underground" # "Deeper Underground" (The Metro Mix) # "High Times" (radio edit) ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Jamiroquai songs
title: Deeper Underground
